1125090.name: OWW: Year 1 Soundtrack Pack
1125090.description:
It was only a year ago when a little known (but ambitious) indie MMO hit Steam, it’s been a year full of ups and downs (mostly ups) and OWW is a little less ‘little known’ yet more ambitious than ever.

To celebrate our first birthday we’re releasing our first-ever DLC pack, it includes:
  • The official soundtracks (17 tracks) in MP3 and FLAC formats + ‘secret’ bonus track ‘Electrify my soul’ (the one from the ads).
  • A collection of 5 masks (3 masks and 2 unique headphones) that will never, ever, be available elsewhere.
  • Special orange avatar background in chat and in-game social profile, in case the masks aren’t enough to stand out from the crowd.
  • A unique framed record vinyl asset that can be placed (almost) anywhere
Each DLC comes with a warm fuzzy feeling knowing you’ve helped the game, devs, and art-loving AI behind it to pay for coffee, cloud servers and to expand what games can be and do in society.

Thank you for supporting the Stikipixels and helping us grow the Artiverse one frog at a time.



The soundtrack contains the following tracks in both MP3 and FLAC format
  • Black
  • Blue No.3
  • Brown
  • Bruno Grife feat. Femme Memoir-Electrify my soul
  • Celestial Blue
  • Emerald
  • Gold
  • Green No. 4
  • Grey
  • Orange Bloom
  • Orange No. 5
  • Purple
  • Serene Green
  • Strawberry
  • Superabundant Blue
  • White
  • Yellow

Track files will be located in the Steam directory. (Steam\steamapps\common\Occupy White Walls\OWW Game soundtrack - Year One)
1125090.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 意大利语*, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 波兰语*, 俄语*, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西*, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙*, 荷兰语*, 希腊语*, 韩语*, 日语*, 简体中文*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
